name: Frogs 'N Flies
description:
Game created for the Frogs Mini Jam.

Has one level to go through.

How to play:

A and D keys (or arrow keys to move)

Space to jump, longer you hold, higher you jump

Mouse to aim and Left click to shoot 

F to switch between different guns

Esc to go back to main menu 

Contributors:

Coder: YaySushi

Coder: Hawtori

Artist: E Von K

How to download and play:

Download Frogs N Flies.zip to your computer

Open folder then right click inside the folder -> Extract all

Choose where to extract the files

After extracting, open the Frogs N Flies folder

Double click Froggie.exe and enjoy!
